answers.answer: What are your symptoms? Diarrhea, shaky, rapid heart rate, high bp, pounding or ringing in ears, anxiety? Those are all hyper symptoms. You are leaning on the hyperthyroid side with a low TSH and high FT3. You need to get a full thyroid workup and see why your FT3 levels are slightly elevated. An antibody test and a pituitary test is in order.Here's a great website where they recommend endos. Call the office ahead of time and ask the nurse if the doc tests and treats the Frees and symptoms for thyroid patients. Also, the more thyroid this doc sees, the better. Mine sees 75 percent thyroid. Many specialize in diabetes and their thryiod knowledge is limited:http://www.thyroid-info.com/topdrs/:) Tamra
BTW - The TSI test for Graves is what people with hyper levels and symptoms get.The TGab and TPOab tests are for Hashimoto's. Hashi people can go hyper, too, and we Hashis can pack on weight.:) Tamra

My symptoms are :I feel like I have arthritis all over my body, its difficult for me to make a fist, ringing in my ears, nausea, acne on my back all of a sudden. I feel huge and everytime I eat I feel like I am going to explode. I have dry mouth and my eyes hurt. I can feel my body shaking inside, not so much on the outside and i keep twitching. Get tired ver easy. i am depressed because I feel like I can;t even communicate with people anymore because I am so sick. I stopped going out.My ANA protein test came back positive, but my lupus tests came back negative.I just got an appointment with an endo at Thomas Jefferson in Philli who I heard was very good.

question: Thyroid tests       My results            Ref RangeTSH                       .50                    .44 - 4.21T4, Free                 .79                    .48 - 1.23Free T3                 4.03                   2.10-3.90T3, Total               153.54               87.00-178.00i had parathyroid surgery last november I gained 65 lbs since then. My thyroid was fine then.Now I still don't feel well and I had a series of other tests done along with this. The Doctors office called said everytest was ok.I had the lab fax me over all of my results also.Do I need to see another doctor?
title: Interpretation please
